title: ghumaghuma ghumayani
sahitya:
ghuma ghuma ghumayani vAsanatO muddu gummalu veDaliri cUDare



anupallavi



mamatatOnu suravaru lella surataru suma vAnalu guriyimpa

vETkaga



caraNam 1



naluvanka nagavattulu tEjarillaga celaga sAmbrANi pogalu

gramma gandha 

     poDulu callucu bayyedala dIyucu pannIrulu cilugucu adukula

vIrunitO



caraNam 2



bangAru cIralu rangaina ravikalu nungaramulu velayanga

sogasuga bhujanga 

     shayanuDagu rangapatini jUci pongucu danivAra gaugalincunu



caraNam 3



varamaina kanaka nUpuramulu ghallana nuramuna mutyAla

sarulella gadalaga

     karamuna sogasaina viri suraTulace visarucu tyAgarAja

varaduni pogaDucu
